Part1.title: Part 1: Multiple Choice Cloze – Working parents

questions.text: and (9) _____ a kid, I’d get up to all sorts of stuff with my friends...
my friends started doing other things (10) _____ shopping and listening to music...
(11) _____ was my brother who first got me _____ skateboarding.
(12) _____ was my brother who first got me  _____ skateboarding.
and to (13) _____ honest, I used to think it was uncool.
even (14) _____ it was dark – in order to compete.
(15) _____ my brother. It obviously paid (16) _____ because I beat him...
_____ my brother. It obviously paid (16) _____ because I beat him...
The wheel is one of the tallest of its kind, at a (17) _____ of 135 metres.
1,700 tons of steel were used for its (18) _____ .
People make special journeys to see the (19) _____ wheel.
Their design was the most (20) _____ of all the projects...
The first (21) _____ of the wheel were made on their kitchen table.
Julia found the (22) _____ site by drawing a circle around London.
Not (23) _____, it took about three years to get the wheel built.
In (24) _____ of their work, the couple were awarded the MBE.

questions.original: Richard asked me how much I had paid for the theatre tickets.
questions.transformed: Richard wanted to ___________________________ the theatre tickets.

questions.original: It wasn’t a good idea for you to delete that file.
The ferry couldn’t sail because the weather was bad.
The teacher told us not to be late on Friday.
questions.transformed: ‘You ___________________________ late on Friday,’ the teacher said.

questions.original: There are Spanish and French translations of the book.
questions.transformed: The book ___________________________ into Spanish and French.

questions.original: She will only phone if she gets lost.
